We recommend booking your tickets online in advance to make your visit as smooth as possible. 

Walk-ins are also welcome. Same-day tickets may be available at the front desk; please note there may be a short wait during busy periods.

Reduced & Free Admission

Discounted or free tickets are available for eligible visitors, including partners, educators, and youth card holders.

Please select the appropriate ticket type when booking online. Proof of eligibility will be required at the front desk when you arrive.

Modified Hours & Closures

  • Early closure at 3:00 PM on August 1 and October 8, 2025
  • The museum will be closed on October 9, 2025

Extended Hours - Summer Thursdays

In June and July, the museum stays open late every Thursday until 8:00 PM.

Please note: the museum will close at 5:30 PM on Thursday, July 24.
